rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with wheelchair-accessible ramp and tactile paving leading into the main living area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space that seamlessly connects to the kitchen, providing a contemporary and accessible design. Ample natural light from south-facing windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Contemporary open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area, equipped with accessible countertops and appliances arranged to comply with wheelchair standards.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located on the ground floor for immediate access. Vastu-aligned to ensure positive energy flow, with natural light and soundproofing.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom designed for easy accessibility, Vastu-aligned placement to enhance wellbeing.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space with ample shelving, designed for quiet study and reading. Vastu principles guide placement to enhance concentration.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip flooring, ensuring safety for all users.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible entrance with a ramp leading to the main living area.

openings.name: Window Opening (Living Room)
openings.description: Large south-facing window for ample natural light and ventilation in the living room.

openings.name: Window Opening (Kitchen)
openings.description: South-facing window to ensure proper lighting and air circulation in the kitchen area.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom to complete the three-bedroom requirement, designed for easy access with an internal ramp from a landing.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Bathroom for the additional bedroom, featuring accessible fixtures and design.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Multi-functional study or office space, designed with ample natural light and conducive for work.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible staircase with a separate ramp for ground floor to first-floor transition.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Entrance
openings.description: Accessible opening leading to the rooftop terrace, with safety railings and ramp access for wheelchair users.
